text: Hey Enrico, so it seems like the best way to get this officially triaged is to post on the <https://community.HubSpot.com/|HubSpot community forum>. Can you try posting there? That should get it triaged to the correct engineering team
I want to be able to randomly delay contacts between 10 minutes to 60 minutes. We don’t have OpsHub for this client. Ideas?
<@U01QVR44MEY> I’m sure you’ve solved this before!

Without OpsHub you may need to create an Integration that can generate a random number. But until we release our Beta that allows inputs to all actions, you wouldn’t be able to use it to randomly delay.
Maybe you could use a Delay Until event happens action?
yeah i was thinking random number but not sure the best way to accomplish that without OpsHub.
can’t think of a good way unfortunately
Man yeah without opshub you'll need to build out a custom action and have that custom action hold up the workflow for the randomly generated amount of time
Not entirely impossible but it would take a couple lines of node to build out the api
You'll want to check this out: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions#blocking-action-execution>
Honestly pretty simple to build this out, <@U03REFNRMB3> if you want I can walk you through the setup on Monday. Just grab sometime on my calendar
Carter, i love it! Let me look at the documentation before I book time!
I didn’t think about a custom action.
Sounds good, just let me know
